title: input.settings.storage.schema
description: energy storage objects indexed by name

energy_ub.description: upper bound of energy that can be stored in kWhrs

charge_ub.description: upper bound of energy that can be inserted into the battery kW

discharge_ub.description: upper bound of energy that can be withdrawn from the battery in kW

sm_ub.description: upper bound on the power in or out of the battery

energy.description: currently stored energy in the battery in kWh

qs_lb.description: lower bound of reactive power that can be outputted in kvar

qs_ub.description: upper bound of reactive power that can be outputted in kvar

status.description: the status of the asset, _i.e._ enabled (`1`) or disabled (`0`)

phase_unbalance_factor.description: Percent within which power input/output must be on between phases on the storage object. Default is Inf
